saunas.name: Löyly Helsinki
saunas.description: An architectural masterpiece on the Helsinki waterfront. Löyly offers exceptional wood-burning and smoke saunas with direct access to the Baltic Sea.

saunas.name: The Well
saunas.description: The largest spa in the Nordics. A massive playground for heat enthusiasts with distinct themed saunas and world-class Aufguss rituals.

saunas.name: Ribersborgs Kallbadhus
saunas.description: Iconic open-air bathhouse from 1898. Separate men's and women's sections with nude bathing and direct ocean access.

saunas.name: Vabali Spa Berlin
saunas.description: A Balinese-style wellness resort in central Berlin. Textile-free paradise with vast grounds and numerous saunas.

saunas.name: Therme Erding
saunas.description: The world's largest thermal bath complex. The sauna area is a textile-free paradise with themes ranging from Roman to Russian.

saunas.name: Aqua Dome
saunas.description: Famous for its three levitating bowl-shaped pools suspended in the air with panoramic views of the Ötztal Alps.

saunas.name: Bathhouse Williamsburg
saunas.description: A former soda factory turned high-performance bathhouse. Features starlight saunas and cold plunges for the modern biohacker.

saunas.name: Community Sauna Baths
saunas.description: A pioneer in the UK's Sauna Renaissance in Hackney Wick. Authentic, wood-fired, and community-focused.

saunas.name: Mediterana
saunas.description: A piece of Marrakech in Germany. Stunning Moorish architecture and high-end sauna ceremonies.

saunas.name: SATAMA Sauna Resort
saunas.description: Famous for its massive 'Theater Sauna' where world-class Aufguss masters perform elaborate shows.

saunas.name: Kristall Therme Kochel
saunas.description: Offers stunning views of Lake Kochelsee and the Alps directly from the sauna benches.

saunas.name: Liquidrom
saunas.description: Known for its saltwater floating pool with underwater techno/classical music and dim, atmospheric lighting.

saunas.name: Friedrichsbad
saunas.description: A temple of bathing culture since 1877. A strict 17-step ritual in a stunning historic building.

saunas.name: Felsentherme
saunas.description: Built directly into the rock face of the mountain. Swim in thermal water while looking at a natural waterfall.

saunas.name: 7132 Therme vals
saunas.description: Peter Zumthor's architectural masterpiece. 60,000 slabs of quartzite creating a mystical, cave-like atmosphere.

saunas.name: QC Termemilano
saunas.description: A wellness oasis in the center of Milan, featuring a sauna built inside a vintage tram carriage.

saunas.name: Archivolto
saunas.description: Bringing the Russian Banya tradition to a modern, design-forward setting in NYC.

saunas.name: Othership
saunas.description: Redefining social wellness with guided emotional regulation classes using heat and cold.

saunas.name: Scandinave Spa Whistler
saunas.description: A silent hydrotherapy cycle nestled in the ancient cedar forests of Whistler.

saunas.name: Awana Spa
saunas.description: Bringing European-style sauna theater and Aufguss to the Las Vegas strip.

saunas.name: Banya No.1
saunas.description: London's first authentic Russian Banya. Expect high heat, oak leaf beatings (Parenie), and cold plunges.

saunas.name: Beach Box Brighton
saunas.description: Wood-fired saunas located directly on Brighton Beach. Run straight into the English Channel to cool off.

saunas.name: Haeckels House
saunas.description: A design-forward spa focusing on locally harvested seaweed and thalassotherapy treatments.

saunas.name: SkySpa
saunas.description: Open-air thermal baths located on the rooftop of a skyscraper, offering unique urban views.

saunas.name: Nordik Spa-Nature
saunas.description: The largest spa in North America. Features a floating salt water pool and countless relaxation areas.

saunas.name: Hot Shop
saunas.description: One of Oslo's trendiest spots. A former sex shop turned into a sleek, industrial-chic neighborhood sauna.

saunas.name: SALT
saunas.description: A nomadic art project with massive pyramid-shaped saunas, often hosting DJs, talks, and concerts.

saunas.name: KOK Oslo
saunas.description: Floating sauna boats that can take you out on the fjord. Combine sightseeing with sweating.

saunas.name: Centralbadet
saunas.description: A stunning Art Nouveau bathhouse in the heart of Stockholm, operating since 1904. Features a beautiful indoor pool, Turkish baths, and classic Swedish saunas.

saunas.name: Hellasgården
saunas.description: Located in a nature reserve just 15 mins from Stockholm city. The go-to place for a lake dip after sauna.

saunas.name: Yasuragi
saunas.description: A massive Japanese ryokan-style spa in the Swedish archipelago. Everyone wears matching yukatas.

saunas.name: CopenHot
saunas.description: Wood-fired hot tubs and saunas right on the Copenhagen harbor front. Very social and lively.

saunas.name: La Source Bains Nordiques
saunas.description: Carved into the side of a mountain, this spa uses modern architecture to frame the raw Canadian wilderness.

saunas.name: H2O Adventure Spa
saunas.description: A massive aquatic centre that includes significant wellness facilities, making it accessible for families.

saunas.name: Thermae Bath Spa
saunas.description: Britain's only natural thermal spa. The rooftop pool offers incredible views over the historic city of Bath.

saunas.name: Rudding Park Spa
saunas.description: Award-winning luxury spa with a focus on bringing the outdoors in. Known for its rooftop spa garden.

saunas.name: Sauna Dek
saunas.description: A hidden gem in Antwerp offering a sleek, modern take on the traditional bathhouse.

saunas.name: Spa Zuiver
saunas.description: A massive wellness complex on the edge of the Amsterdam forest. High standards and textile-free days.

saunas.name: Sauna Shikiji
saunas.description: Known as the 'Holy Land' for saunners in Japan. Famous for its natural groundwater cold plunge which is drinkable.

saunas.name: Skyspa Yokohama
saunas.description: Located on the 14th floor with stunning views of Yokohama Bay. A hub for modern Japanese sauna culture.

saunas.name: Blue Lagoon
saunas.description: World-famous geothermal spa located in a lava field. The milky blue water is rich in minerals like silica and sulfur.

saunas.name: Secret Lagoon
saunas.description: Iceland's oldest swimming pool, made in 1891. A more authentic and less crowded alternative to the Blue Lagoon.

saunas.name: Iglu Park
saunas.description: A cool village of Iglucraft saunas right on the Baltic Sea in the Noblessner district.

saunas.name: Kalma Saun
saunas.description: One of Tallinn's oldest public saunas. A truly authentic experience with massive wood-burning ovens.

saunas.name: Bondi Icebergs
saunas.description: The most famous pool in Australia. The sauna overlooks the pool where waves crash over the side.

saunas.name: Peninsula Hot Springs
saunas.description: Award-winning natural geothermal mineral springs and day spa. The hilltop pool offers 360-degree views.
